description:
The Microsoft OCR Library for Windows Runtime allows developers to add text recognition capabilities to their apps. 

Supported platforms: Windows Phone 8, Windows Phone 8.1, Windows 8.1 (Windows Store apps only). 

Supported languages: Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish. 

Terms of use: Please review the license. This is a stable version of the library and it can be used in apps published on the Store. 

Documentation: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windowspreview.media.ocr.aspx. 

Code sample: https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Uses-the-OCR-Library-to-2a9f5bf4.

NOTE:
In Windows 10, OCR is part of Windows SDK as Universal Windows Platform (UWP) API. 
UWP documentation: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.media.ocr.aspx.
UWP code samples: https://github.com/Microsoft/Windows-universal-samples/tree/master/Samples/OCR.
summary: The Microsoft OCR Library for Windows Runtime allows developers to add text recognition capabilities to their apps.
title: Microsoft OCR Library for Windows Runtime
